author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
As part of https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/4912 it was identified that the code base has inconsistent use of the copyright symbol:

```none
Copyright (c)
Copyright (C)
Copyright ©
```

I'll follow up with legal to get their recommendation

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: Official word from legal is to use `(c)`

title: inconsistent use of copyright symbol
